name: PlurRadio
0:
”Alexa, open plur radio”
”Alexa, start plur radio”
”Alexa, ask plur radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: plur radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to PLUR Radio, your ultimate destination for 24/7 music streaming, a world of beats, rhythms, and blockchain-powered experiences, all designed to keep you connected to the music you love. Whether you're chilling at home, working on your next big project, or partying with friends, PLUR Radio has the perfect playlist for you.

Key Features:

Non-stop music streaming 24/7.
A seamless listening experience.
A mix of genres to match your mood and energy.

Join the PLUR movement and let the music and technology unite for peace, love, unity, and respect.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
